name: genie-logiciel
description: Course for Genie Lociel in Paris Descartes

scripts.copy:doc: npm run copy:md && npm run copy:img
scripts.copy: npm run copy:robots && npm run copy:google && npm run copy:doc && npm run copy:favicon
scripts.reveal:css: cat ./node_modules/reveal.js/css/reveal.css | ./node_modules/.bin/cleancss -O2 -o ./dist/css/reveal.css && cat ./node_modules/reveal.js/css/theme/night.css | grep -v -E "^@import" | grep -v -E "font-family:.*?sans-serif" | ./node_modules/.bin/cleancss -O2 -o ./dist/css/night.css && cat ./node_modules/reveal.js/lib/css/zenburn.css | ./node_modules/.bin/cleancss -O2 -o ./dist/css/zenburn.css && cat ./node_modules/reveal.js/css/print/paper.css | ./node_modules/.bin/cleancss -O2 -o ./dist/css/paper.css
scripts.reveal: npm run reveal:copy && npm run reveal:css && npm run reveal:js
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy && npm run reveal && npm run js && npm run style && npm run mustache && npm run minify
scripts.start: ALGOLIA_APP=H35CS6IJ9J ALGOLIA_KEY=SECRET ALGOLIA_INDEX=l3miage viws -tls=false -directory ${INIT_CWD}/dist -csp "default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' cdn.jsdelivr.net; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; connect-src 'self' *.algolia.net *.algolianet.com" -env ALGOLIA_APP,ALGOLIA_KEY,ALGOLIA_INDEX

author: Vincent Boutour <bob@vibioh.fr>
